resources.string: Interview - Kit is the most useful application, which is used to guide the students for their career and shares the knowledge for cracking interviews.\n It includes materials, interview questions(I.Q's), resumes for both fresher and experienced, quiz and updates on latest jobs e.t.c.. on respective technologies.
